last_episode_to_air.name: Parting Gift
last_episode_to_air.overview: The year's coming to an end, and the graduating students ask Gerry what the annual Parting Gift from the principal is going to be. The tradition is news to Gerry, but he’s going to go big, or go home.

name: Mr. D
overview: Based on Gerry Dee's real-life experiences as a high school teacher before he switched to comedy full-time, MR. D is a story about a charming, under-qualified teacher trying to fake his way through a teaching job, just like he often fakes his way through life.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Follows a teacher juggle through being a teacher and deal with his students while trying to maintain his not so cool lifestyle.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Gerry Duncan has finally gotten a full time teaching position at the prestigious Xavier academy after years of substituting. Unfortunately he'll be teaching social studies, which he knows nothing about, instead of his dream phys ed job.

episodes.name: 24 Hour Famine
episodes.overview: Gerry volunteers for a 24-hour charity event to spend time with Xavier's hot guidance counselor.

episodes.name: Grade the Teacher
episodes.overview: When Gerry sees how many positive reviews Dwyer has on gradetheteacher.com, he embarks on a campaign to match him somehow. Meanwhile, Simon takes Bobbi's advice to stand up to a student but ends up ma...

episodes.name: Exam Week
episodes.overview: It’s exam time at Xavier Academy and Gerry is convinced that he will catch a few students who are known to cheat on their exams.

episodes.name: Bully Awareness Week
episodes.overview: Gerry commits himself to making a video presentation for Bully Awareness Week and finds himself with little time to deliver, while Robert is torn over how he will proceed with a new relationship.

episodes.name: The Dance
episodes.overview: Gerry organizes a dance fundraiser to cover some costs for the girls basketball team, while Robert reveals to Lisa that he had a dream about Trudy which has made him uncomfortable around her.

episodes.name: Job Opportunity
episodes.overview: Gerry tries to get a job as a physical education teacher after one opens up; Lisa has troubles with her new student teacher.

episodes.name: Guest Speaker
episodes.overview: Gerry has trouble finding a guest speaker for career day; Robert tries to avoid the flu.

episodes.name: Quiz Cup
episodes.overview: Lisa takes over the school’s Quiz Cup academic team, as Bobbi uncomfortably tries to guide her grade 5′s through their health unit. Robert loses his patience with Trudy over her constant practical jokes.

episodes.name: Field Trip
episodes.overview: Gerry helps Bobbi supervise her Grade 5/6 field trip to the museum, while Jeff and Robert cover his classes back at Xavier.

episodes.name: The Basketball Diaries
episodes.overview: Can Gerry score his first win of the basketball season? Robert plans a principal's 25th anniversary celebration for an uncooperative Callaghan.

episodes.name: Charity Day
episodes.overview: Gerry and Mr. Dwyer fight in a charity boxing match; Robert tries to befriend Lisa after she finds his phone.

episodes.name: Gerry's Evaluation
episodes.overview: When Gerry is evaluated by a member of the board, he must go out of his way to prove that he is great at his job, or risk severe punishment.

episodes.name: Late Shift
episodes.overview: Gerry takes a second job but struggles to juggle both. When the school is pressed to cut costs, Robert is forced to cut from Leung's library. When Trudy learns Bobbi can't flirt, she calls her on it.

episodes.name: World Religions
episodes.overview: Gerry's 'World Religions' unit goes off course when he brings his personal views into the classroom. Trudy and Robert compete to get the best birthday gift for Callaghan. Simon has a crush on a new teacher whom Gerry thinks is a man.

episodes.name: Overnight Trip
episodes.overview: Gerry concocts a scheme to get his class to go to Boston so that he and Bill can watch a Celtics game.

episodes.name: The Crush
episodes.overview: Gerry develops a crush on the Scottish mother of one of his most annoying students.

episodes.name: The Other Woman
episodes.overview: When Bobbi and her long-term boyfriend Craig break up again, Gerry is there for the rebound... Craig's rebound.

episodes.name: The Date
episodes.overview: In gearing up for his big date with Jean McGrory, Gerry is dismissive of Trudy's dating advice.

episodes.name: Gerry's Favourite Couple
episodes.overview: Xavier's favourite senior couple, Sean and Miranda ('Searanda'), are on the rocks.

episodes.name: Poker Night
episodes.overview: When Gerry comes across a down and out Daniel Negreanu (poker player), he orchestrates a staff poker night in order to get Daniel back on his feet.

episodes.name: Staff Retreat
episodes.overview: The staff are involved in an elaborate trust game that accidently reveals some of their darkest secrets.

episodes.name: Culture Day
episodes.overview: It's Culture Day at Xavier and each teacher has been asked to model their classroom after a country.

episodes.name: Strip Club
episodes.overview: Gerry suspects that Dwyer is moonlighting as a stripper and there's only one way to find out for sure.

episodes.name: Slam Dunk
episodes.overview: Gerry tries to convince Bobbi to give him a senior boys basketball team next season. Robert learns that his year end evaluation came with one complaint.

episodes.name: Parent Teacher Night
episodes.overview: When Mr. D has only one opportunity to meet Paul Henderson and have his priceless Team Canada jersey signed, he won't let Xavier Academy's parent teacher night get in the way.

episodes.name: Old School
episodes.overview: Gerry decides he's going to make an impression on the runway of Lisa's faculty fashion show. Robert and Leung team up to find the vandal who has been defacing staff pictures.

episodes.name: Donor Dinner
episodes.overview: When Gerry finds out that Robert is trying to charm Xavier Academy's most generous philanthropist into continuing her support, Gerry decides he's going to show up Robert.

episodes.name: Assistant Leung
episodes.overview: Gerry is forced to appoint his arch nemesis Mr. Leung as his new assistant coach. His attempts to put Leung in his place as his subordinate end up backfiring.

episodes.name: Food Drive
episodes.overview: It's Food Drive Month at Xavier Academy, and Gerry is determined to make sure he wins the prize for being the teacher with the class that contributes the most food.

episodes.name: Gerry Gets Gym
episodes.overview: When Gerry is asked to temporarily fill in for an absent phys-ed teacher, he aggressively pursues what he sees as an "audition" to make a permanent move into the gymnasium.

episodes.name: Self Defense
episodes.overview: Gerry decides to "help" Bobbi with her girls' self defense class, but ends up feeling emasculated when it becomes obvious that she is able to physically dominate him.

episodes.name: Graduation
episodes.overview: After Gerry has a positive interview for a position with Xavier's main rival school, he attempts to use it as leverage with Principal Callaghan.

episodes.name: Mafia Dad
episodes.overview: Gerry gets a chance to coach the varsity basketball team; Trudy gives Lisa a controversial gift; Dwyer suffers a bad day.

episodes.name: Staff Hangover
episodes.overview: The staff is in rough shape at the morning assembly; the new librarian is revealed.

episodes.name: President Jimmy
episodes.overview: Gerry gets involved in the student council election; Robert tries to end a smear campaign; Lisa doesn't get along with the school's librarian.

episodes.name: Callaghan's Daughter
episodes.overview: Gerry wants to take Callaghan's daughter on a date; Bobbi leads a photo shoot for Xavier's campaign.

episodes.name: Dating Maya Student
episodes.overview: Gerry has a hard time accepting a former student as an adult; Robert tries too hard to connect with a student; Bobbi tries to prove her femininity to Malik.

episodes.name: Short Stocked
episodes.overview: Gerry raises money for a down payment to buy his rental; Robert's pride gets in the way; Lisa plans a farewell for the crossing guard.

episodes.name: Corporal Punishment
episodes.overview: Francis visits the school which inspires Gerry in dealing with a student; Simon runs away; Trudy uncovers more of Malik's past.

episodes.name: Lockdown
episodes.overview: Gerri has an encounter with a female police officer; Bobbi tries to end things with Robert; Simon believes he can protect Xavier using science.

episodes.name: Gerry's Kid
episodes.overview: After a run-in with an old fling, Gerry is convinced her daughter is his; Robert gets ready for the 20th reunion of his chess club.

episodes.name: Teacher Conference
episodes.overview: Gerry meets an attractive woman at Barrel’s and drags Lisa with him to a teacher conference in Atlantic City to find her.

episodes.name: Coaching Prospects
episodes.overview: Gerry's star player is being scouted and he doesn't want to be left out; Robert sells tickets to his play; Malik spreads the love with 20 second hugs.

episodes.name: Bizarro
episodes.overview: Something very strange is happening at Xavier Academy. The day to day goings on of Gerry and the rest of the staff have been completely reversed.

episodes.name: Coach of the Year
episodes.overview: After winning the city championship, Gerry thinks he'll get Coach of the Year; Callaghan makes an announcement; Frank is determined to help Jimmy find a career.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Follows a teacher juggle through being a teacher and deal with his students while trying to maintain his not so cool lifestyle.

episodes.name: Gerry's Redemption
episodes.overview: Gerry is forced to sub at a tough inner-city school after losing his job at Xavier Academy. Back at Xavier, the staff is worried that Robert is having a nervous breakdown because he didn't get the principal's job.

episodes.name: Educational Assistant
episodes.overview: Gerry is assigned an educational assistant, Marty, who quickly becomes a new source of irritation in the classroom

episodes.name: Wrestling For Love
episodes.overview: When Lisa asks Gerry to cover coaching duties for the upcoming wrestling tournament, Gerry promises to bring home two trophies...

episodes.name: Gerry Runs a Sweat Shop
episodes.overview: Gerry hatches a new "get rich quick" scheme selling counterfeit One Direction merchandise when he finds out the band is in town. But making countless beaded bracelets at home is tedious work, and Gerry soon realizes he has a whole classroom full of potential unpaid labourers just waiting to be exploited.

episodes.name: Re-Tired of Marking
episodes.overview: When Gerry is suddenly promoted from sub to full-time teacher, his initial thrill is quickly squashed by the realization that he’s back to real teaching responsibilities.

episodes.name: Duncan vs. Bailey
episodes.overview: When Gerry learns that former Olympic champion Donovan Bailey is coming to town, he's determined to seek retribution for a long-standing bone he has with the track “star.”

episodes.name: Student Teacher
episodes.overview: Gerry and Simon are both assigned student teachers. Gerry is thrilled to have a minion picking up the slack, while Simon is anxious about the added responsibility. Gerry soon learns that his hands-off approach will not work, as his student teacher, Gloria, is terrified of the students and requires Gerry's presence at all times.

episodes.name: Gerry Wants a Union
episodes.overview: After Gerry has an unpleasant run-in with a unionized construction worker, he decides he wants to form a teachers union at Xavier. Meanwhile, Robert reads the riot act when Malik skips out early on his janitorial duties; and Lisa is smitten with Trudy's brother.

episodes.name: Duncan Does Detention
episodes.overview: Gerry has big weekend plans for a fantasy baseball draft when he's told he has to cover Saturday detention. In an effort to bury the hatchet and come to terms with Lisa's appointment as the new principal, Robert and Lisa have an impromptu heart to heart.

episodes.name: Gerry Coaches Fencing
episodes.overview: Gerry's been given another coaching assignment, but this time he's helping Ricki prepare for a fencing tournament, and he couldn't be less interested. In an effort to capitalize on Dwyer's recent divorce, Bobbi invites him over for dinner and attempts to seduce him the only way she knows how. Poorly.

episodes.name: Hell-icopter Mom
episodes.overview: When he attempts to reign in a bratty student, Gerry is faced with the wrath of his notoriously overprotective and obnoxious mother. Upon realizing that she has fallen into the role of staff "punching bag," Bobbi attempts to transfer the title onto another staff member. Meanwhile, Ricki sells pencils to Robert and drives a hard bargain.

episodes.name: Out Cold
episodes.overview: Gerry accompanies students on a leadership retreat to a nature centre where he meets the beautiful staff member, Jasmine. Lisa finds out that Trudy is running a morbid “death pool” gambling ring. And Simon and Frank’s innocent game of rugby spoons takes an ugly turn.

episodes.name: Gerry Turns 40
episodes.overview: Gerry is turning forty, and after finding a letter he wrote to himself ten years earlier, he becomes acutely aware of everything he has failed to accomplish. Meanwhile, Simon's ferret goes missing and Lisa wants to impress the chairman of the board of trustees by putting on an elaborate fun fair in his honour, which quickly devolves into a complete disaster.

episodes.name: Gerry Does It Again
episodes.overview: Gerry and Lisa attempt to navigate their new reality as a married couple. Meanwhile, Emma's library receives a shipment of e-readers and Nisha attempts to have a pleasant dinner with Simon and his Mom.

episodes.name: Gerry Wants to Stay Married
episodes.overview: Lisa has second thoughts about the marriage, but Gerry isn't throwing in the towel so quickly. Meanwhile, Robert gives a new treadmill desk a try; and Bobbi's aglow after being called an "inspiration" by a former student.

episodes.name: Gerry Gets a Kid
episodes.overview: With Hayden's wealthy father on his deathbed and preparing to bequeth Hayden's favorite staff, Gerry attempts to ingratiate himself to the young student. Meanwhile, Lisa and Robert are named co-principals, shifting the balance of power; and Nisha ruins an innocent children's game.

episodes.name: Gerry Goes to Prison
episodes.overview: Gerry, Simon and Nisha take on various teaching side jobs in an effort to save up for their respective March break getaways.

episodes.name: A Star is Born
episodes.overview: Gerry steps into the role of a lifetime and finds himself bitten by the acting bug and reveling in the new-found attention. Bobbi tries a new tactic in order to motivate her lethargic students and Nisha discovers a manipulative teaching technique.

episodes.name: Gerry Throws the Game
episodes.overview: Gerry takes on the senior girls' volleyball team. But when he realizes their semifinals will be interfering with his all-important social schedule, he sets out to sabotage them at the quarterfinals. Meanwhile, Robert needs to increase the 'between class hustle,' and Trudy posts a terrible photo on the allergy wall.

episodes.name: The Man with Two Red Shoes
episodes.overview: When Gerry learns of a lurker in the vicinity, he sets out to catch said lurker and earn the Teach of the Month title. Meanwhile, Robert creates a Xavier Academy montage, from which Bobbi is conspicuously lacking, and a new feud develops between Dwyer and Nisha.

episodes.name: Gerry Has Hot Sub Anxiety
episodes.overview: Gerry is blown away by the hotness of the new subs and sets his sights on Mary, the likely love of his life. Meanwhile, Simon and Nisha ready themselves for their big first kiss, and Bobbi attempts a "kill 'em with kindness" method for dealing with a difficult student.

episodes.name: Busploitation
episodes.overview: When Gerry hears that a Kickstarter campaign raised a bundle of money for a bullied bus monitor, he sets out to victimize himself in a similar fashion. Meanwhile, Dwyer has a new "killer" girlfriend and Bobbi comes to a surprising realization.

episodes.name: Gerry Charters a New Course
episodes.overview: When Gerry isn't given a full-time contract for the following year, he makes a bold move that may change the course of his career. Meanwhile, Lisa attempts in vain to show her appreciation to the staff, and Robert and Bobbi plan for a major shift in the Phys Ed department.

episodes.name: Gerry Wants to Make Phys Ed Great Again
episodes.overview: It's a new school year and Gerry has finally achieved his goal: full-time Phys Ed! But when he finds out how Bobbi's been teaching Phys Ed, Gerry's appalled.

episodes.name: Gerry Rigs PTA
episodes.overview: Lisa, now married to Alex’s father and still reeling from her Xavier departure, sets out to punish the staff by running for the unopposed position of PTA president.

episodes.name: Gerry Cuts a Footloose
episodes.overview: When Gerry meets a DJ at the gym, he offers her a job at the school dance, but Robert has banned dances and won't budge on his position.

episodes.name: Gerry Coaches Hockey
episodes.overview: Gerry suspects Central High of cheating; Bobbi prepares for maternity leave.

episodes.name: Formative Bullshit
episodes.overview: Gerry's dream job takes another hit when he learns that teaching Phys Ed requires more paperwork than he could ever have anticipated.

episodes.name: Gerry Pay to Play
episodes.overview: After getting pulled into participating in the teacher auction, Gerry finds himself in a compromising situation that may or may not involve calves and oil.

episodes.name: Work to Rule
episodes.overview: Gerry learns the meaning of "Work-to-Rule" and is immediately in awe of this new and exciting concept. Meanwhile, Lisa attempts to set some much-needed boundaries between herself and her hormonally charged stepson, and Nisha inadvertently reveals a little too much to her students.

episodes.name: Gerry Wants What He Can't Trans
episodes.overview: Gerry takes control of the girl's soccer team to get back at Coach Meyers; an ambitious mom seduces Frank; Lisa's reign of terror seemingly comes to an end.

episodes.name: Principal for a Day
episodes.overview: Gerry's least-favorite student becomes Principal for a Day; a harmless prank goes sour; Bobbi accidentally ruins a student's life.

episodes.name: Gerry's Security Insecurity
episodes.overview: Robert hires a security guard after a string of thefts; Robert learns the truth behind his baby's name.

episodes.name: Gerry's Insider's Look
episodes.overview: Using Xavier Academy as its sample, an investigative reporting team sets out to determine the true value of the private school system. Through a series of interviews and recovered footage, however, the team instead exposes Xavier's deepest and darkest secret: Gerry Duncan.

episodes.name: Big Japan
episodes.overview: The "Insider's Look" exposé on Gerry costs him his job and makes it impossible to get a new one, so he has no choice but to get as far away as he can to start a new life, leaving Xavier behind.

episodes.name: Finnished Teaching
episodes.overview: When Gerry's officially introduced as Xavier's new principal, the staff's obvious disappointment leads Gerry to try and gain their trust by making some drastic moves he thinks everyone can appreciate.

episodes.name: Breaking Slime
episodes.overview: Slime is all the rage across Xavier, leading Gerry to ban it. Gerry also learns, however, that slime is actually a pretty lucrative business... and his ban just created a vacuum.

episodes.name: Mister D
episodes.overview: Gerry's approached by a producer who wants to use Xavier as a backdrop for a movie, but he gets too caught up in the details to see the big picture.

episodes.name: Security Threat
episodes.overview: When Gerry's almost injured in a staffroom incident, he's disappointed to realize the staff's indifference over his near-death experience.

episodes.name: The Dwyer Way
episodes.overview: When Gerry realizes how poorly he's been taking care of himself, he adopts Dwyer's strict diet. Diets require the kind of discipline Gerry lacks, however, so he decides that if he has to suffer, the entire school has to suffer with him.

episodes.name: A Wedding Story
episodes.overview: Bobbi and Robert's big day is fast approaching and, tired of being alone, Gerry desperately wants his own partner. His search takes him online, but doesn't exactly translate to love.

episodes.name: Parting Gift
episodes.overview: The year's coming to an end, and the graduating students ask Gerry what the annual Parting Gift from the principal is going to be. The tradition is news to Gerry, but he’s going to go big, or go home.
